growth_cost_holder.componentleveltooltip: Population surplus cost||This is the amount of [[img:icon_pop_surplus]][[/img]]population surplus required to recruit this character.||This amount will be subtracted from the horde where this character is recruited from.

recruitment_cost_holder.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to recruit this character.

upkeep_cost_holder.componentleveltooltip: Upkeep||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn while this character exists.

intrigue_cost_holder.componentleveltooltip: Influence||This is the amount of [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]influence required to recruit this character.

black_ark_buildings.componentleveltooltip: [[col:green]]This Black Ark has previously constructed buildings.[[/col]]
